name: Energy Crisis (ItsTheBrandonC)
description:
Energy Crisis is an FPS set in a future where bullets have been depleted in a war against robots. Instead, humanity has created weapons powered by batteries that fire powerful beams of energy. When robots are destroyed, they leak an energy field that can be used to charge the batteries in your inventory. You must manage the limited energy in your possession and prioritized which batteries to charge to defeat the robots and turn the city into a safe haven.

  • Shoot Energy Guns
  • Steal Energy Back From The Robots
  • Create A Safe Haven
